analysis.description:
MiniMeToken.balances (/unique_chucks/4/0xbcc546eb5a290977180f85cafaa712019893729c.sol#242-243) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- doTransfer (/unique_chucks/4/0xbcc546eb5a290977180f85cafaa712019893729c.sol#344-381)
	- balanceOfAt (/unique_chucks/4/0xbcc546eb5a290977180f85cafaa712019893729c.sol#463-484)
	- generateTokens (/unique_chucks/4/0xbcc546eb5a290977180f85cafaa712019893729c.sol#559-575)
	- destroyTokens (/unique_chucks/4/0xbcc546eb5a290977180f85cafaa712019893729c.sol#583-597)
MiniMeToken.isContract (/unique_chucks/4/0xbcc546eb5a290977180f85cafaa712019893729c.sol#668-678) is declared view but contains assembly code

MiniMeToken.claimTokens (/unique_chucks/4/0xbcc546eb5a290977180f85cafaa712019893729c.sol#701-714) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(controller,balance) (/unique_chucks/4/0xbcc546eb5a290977180f85cafaa712019893729c.sol#713)

MiniMeToken.getValueAt.min (local variable @ /unique_chucks/4/0xbcc546eb5a290977180f85cafaa712019893729c.sol#634-635) shadows:
	- MiniMeToken.min (function @ /unique_chucks/4/0xbcc546eb5a290977180f85cafaa712019893729c.sol#679-681)

Reentrancy in MiniMeToken.doApprove (/unique_chucks/4/0xbcc546eb5a290977180f85cafaa712019893729c.sol#407-413):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(TokenController(controller).onApprove(msg.sender,_spender,_amount)) (/unique_chucks/4/0xbcc546eb5a290977180f85cafaa712019893729c.sol#409-410)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- allowed (/unique_chucks/4/0xbcc546eb5a290977180f85cafaa712019893729c.sol#410-412)

Reentrancy in FundRequestTokenGeneration.doPayment (/unique_chucks/4/0xbcc546eb5a290977180f85cafaa712019893729c.sol#822-839):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(validPurchase(beneficiary)) (/unique_chucks/4/0xbcc546eb5a290977180f85cafaa712019893729c.sol#824-827)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- deposits (/unique_chucks/4/0xbcc546eb5a290977180f85cafaa712019893729c.sol#833)
	- totalCollected (/unique_chucks/4/0xbcc546eb5a290977180f85cafaa712019893729c.sol#830-831)

MiniMeToken.isContract uses assembly (/unique_chucks/4/0xbcc546eb5a290977180f85cafaa712019893729c.sol#668-678)
	- /unique_chucks/4/0xbcc546eb5a290977180f85cafaa712019893729c.sol#671-678
MiniMeToken.version should be constant (/unique_chucks/4/0xbcc546eb5a290977180f85cafaa712019893729c.sol#214-216)
ApproveAndCallFallBack.receiveApproval (/unique_chucks/4/0xbcc546eb5a290977180f85cafaa712019893729c.sol#17-20) should be declared external
